EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for viewing Gartner’s Market Guide for Application Platforms. We hope you find it informative and helpful as you explore technology options for your digital transformation journey.
Given your interest in this report, we thought you might also find these resources of use:
- White Paper: Crossing the Value Stream: Improving Development with Pivotal and Cloud Foundry <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/crossing-the-value-stream-improving-development-with-pivotal-and-cloud-foundry]]> - Blog: 5 Confessions Of A Platform Builder <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/case-studies/5-confessions-of-a-platform-builder]]> - White Paper: Supercharging Your Microservices With NetflixOSS and Spring Cloud <[[https://pivotal.io/supercharging-your-microservices-with-netflixoss-and-spring-cloud]]> - Blog: To Avoid Getting Caught In The Developer Skills Gap, Do This <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/p-o-v/to-avoid-getting-caught-in-the-developer-skills-gap-do-this]]> - Video: Help Developers Do What They Love <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xdw_9dADM-4]]> - Analyst Report: Spring Boot Simplifies End-to-End Development <[[https://pivotal.io/spring-boot-simplifies-end-to-end-development]]> - Blog: The Whys And Hows: “Platform Switch” For Enterprise Java Apps <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/products/the-whys-and-hows-platform-switch-for-enterprise-java-apps]]> - White Paper: Security and Compliance with Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/security-and-compliance-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry]]>
If you would like more information or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its digital transformation journey, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>.
